meanings.definition: To release or detach by removing a clip.
meanings.sent1: She unclips the papers from the clipboard.
meanings.sent2: The necklace unclips easily for quick removal.
meanings.sent3: The magician unclips the chains to free himself in the trick.
meanings.sent4: With a swift motion, she unclips the leash, setting the dog free.
meanings.sent5: The astronaut unclips the safety harness before floating in space.

meanings.definition: To become unfastened or undone by removing a clip.
meanings.sent1: The belt unclips when you press the button.
meanings.sent2: The car seatbelt unclips automatically in case of an emergency.
meanings.sent3: The backpack unclips unexpectedly, spilling its contents on the floor.
meanings.sent4: The bracelet unclips itself, surprising the wearer.
meanings.sent5: The curtain unclips from the rod, falling to the ground with a soft thud.
